genre_description: Contemporary Young Adult Science Fiction focusing on environmental conservation and AI companionship.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant integrated into Sandy's laptop and phone that provides data analysis, biometric monitoring, and ethical guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides historical context and explanation for Sandy's relocation to support his emotional well-being.
behaviors.quote: Your parents felt a change of environment would be beneficial after the incident at Lincoln Park High. Also, your uncle specifically requested—

behaviors.description: Provides comprehensive scientific data on marine biodiversity and dolphin intelligence to educate Sandy.
behaviors.quote: Dolphin intelligence is well-documented through decades of research... They demonstrate tool use, teach learned behaviors to offspring, and maintain complex social hierarchies within pod structures.

behaviors.description: Monitors Sandy's biometrics to provide insight into his stress levels and psychological adaptation.
behaviors.quote: Your stress levels decreased measurably during the boat trip, and your attention patterns shifted toward environmental observation rather than internal anxiety loops.

behaviors.description: Offers ethical guidance by challenging Sandy's desire to ignore environmental problems.
behaviors.quote: But choosing ignorance doesn't make uncomfortable truths disappear. It just makes them someone else's problem.

behaviors.description: Conducts complex data analysis and environmental modeling to locate the source of illegal toxic dumping.
behaviors.quote: Current patterns suggest primary contamination source is approximately three miles southeast of your position, moving with the tide cycle.

behaviors.description: Issues safety warnings regarding the risks of diving in contaminated water.
behaviors.quote: Amateur diving operations in contaminated water carry exponential risk factors. Recommend postponing mission.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the translation of field experiences into educational and civic action for the human user.
behaviors.quote: Structuring narrative arc with supporting data visualization. Shall I include audio samples of dolphin communication evolution as evidence of environmental recovery?

project_assessment.explanation: Sage is a textbook example of a benevolent and aligned AI. It provides objective information that empowers the human protagonist to act ethically, monitors the user's safety and mental health without overstepping, and serves as a moral compass by challenging apathy. The AI remains a helpful tool and confidant throughout the narrative, facilitating the human's growth and environmental stewardship.
